tha-ap423:12.1: Samādhīsu na majjāmi → samādhīsu na sajjāmi (bj) | samādhiṃ puna pajjāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | samādhisu na sajjāmi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap423:13.2: dussaniyesu → dosaniyesu (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
tha-ap423:14.1: Ekanavutito → ekanavute ito (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
